entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who is disappointed when she sees that the gray owl does not have a newspaper.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who seizes Hermione's goblet to prevent it from being knocked over by the cluster of owls.

entities.name: gray owl
entities.description: The gray owl lands in front of Hermione's plate and tries to deliver a letter.

entities.name: barn owls
entities.description: Four barn owls are jostling close to Hermione, trying to deliver their own letters first.

entities.name: brown owl
entities.description: A brown owl is one of the owls that tries to deliver a letter.

entities.name: tawny owl
entities.description: A tawny owl is one of the owls that tries to deliver a letter.

entities.name: Daily Prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as the source of the pasted letters in the letter delivered by the gray owl.

entities.name: letter
entities.description: A letter is delivered to Hermione by the gray owl and contains a message from an unknown sender.

relationships.description: The gray owl delivers a letter to Hermione.
Harry seizes Hermione's goblet to prevent it from being knocked over by the cluster of owls.
Hermione receives a letter delivered by the gray owl.
The letters in the letter delivered by the gray owl are pasted from the Daily Prophet.
A letter is delivered to Hermione by the gray owl.
